snippet: Kelly Posner of the Center for Suicide Risk Assessment at Columbia University and Dr. Kenneth R. Silk, a psychiatrist, respond to an editorial.
lead_paragraph: Kelly Posner of the Center for Suicide Risk Assessment at Columbia University and Dr. Kenneth R. Silk, a psychiatrist, respond to an editorial.

headline.print_headline: Progress and Hope on Preventing Veteran Suicides
